website_summaries.verdict: While this name necklace is nicely made for a value price, the chain isn't suitable for everyone, and chances are unique or rare names won't be available.
pros: Gold-tone metal over brass with a substantial feel
Customers rave about its stylish looks and inexpensive price
cons: there are only 100 to choose from
Chain is 16 inches – that is the only length available

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: It was good while it lasted. It's a good length, not choker length but not too long at all. It didn't rust or start turning a different color, BUT, it did eventually break. The little loops connecting to the name broke. And because of how small it is, it's very difficult to fix. Otherwise, if you're more careful with it, you should be fine.
customer_reviews.author: buyer

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love!
customer_reviews.text: Just received it today!!!! I love this reckless very stylish and beautiful. Ive always wanted a reckless like this since seeing Carrie Bradshaw from sex in the city with one. ♥️♥️♥️♥️♥️
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rethink before you order
customer_reviews.text: Sadly very disappointed. I ordered the joy necklace for myself and it was great. It was sturdy and beautiful and did not tarnish. However Thai necklace was a gift and it came broke. The worse part was when she opened it it was broke because I didn't open the box. I hate to say it but don't buy from here because my second time was so bad I won't buy here again and I loved my joy necklace.
customer_reviews.author: Katie G

customer_reviews.title: I wear it every single day and it is still like new. I have had to use a pair ...
customer_reviews.text: Waited awhile to post this, I have had this necklace for over 7 months, I wear it every single day and it is still like new. I have had to use a pair of jewelry pliers to tighten the rings holding the necklace plate once. However that’s understandable considering it was only $15 and I pull it a lot on accident moving my hair. Great buy will buy again if it ever breaks or loses its color. (I don’t wear it in water)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Chain is weak! Don't count on this being something you can wear 24/7
customer_reviews.text: Cute, delivered quickly. Had to add a necklace extender to it and cover the entire thing in clear nail polish once I noticed it starting to tarnish.. the chain broke right in the middle of the chain when I was pulling it down to adjust it, not near a clasp or with unreasonable force. Sent back to sender, refunded almost immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer H.

customer_reviews.title: She loves it!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a birthday gift for my daughter and she loves it. She wears it everyday! The gift came nicely packaged in a pretty box which I was not expecting -- saved me from having to find a small box/wrapping, etc. The necklace is in perfect condition, no damage as noted by previous reviewers. Yes....I would buy this again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: StaceyV.

customer_reviews.title: but I added an extender and it's a very nice necklace. Nice quality and looks good
customer_reviews.text: I wish the chain was an inch or two longer, but I added an extender and it's a very nice necklace. Nice quality and looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Feen

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised by how nice this nameplate necklace is!!! It doesn't look cheap at all!! Awesome for the price!!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my birthday girl
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter for her 5th birthday, its absolutely beautiful and shes so In love with it and has yet to take it off except for bath time.
customer_reviews.author: brandi

customer_reviews.title: From the moment our daughter opened the box we all fell in love with this necklace
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous!! From the moment our daughter opened the box we all fell in love with this necklace. Our daughter feels so proud to wear this necklace. It fits well and looks elegant. Thank you for making this special gift. We are so happy.
customer_reviews.author: Happyplanet

customer_reviews.title: super cute for my little girl
customer_reviews.text: this is perfect for a 4 year old she went to preschool and showed every one from the front office to all in her class so glad they had my little Baileys name already its really small again perfect for a 4 year old -10 would like a bigger font size for myself or my teenager 14 but again we love it so much thank you seller
customer_reviews.author: BNDEE

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: I have now bought two of these. My teenager gave the first one away to a boyfriend who never returned it when they broke up. I replaced it this Christmas and she loves it. For an affordable piece of jewelry, it holds up very well. She wears it daily and gets a lot of compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Davidson

customer_reviews.title: 😞
customer_reviews.text: This has already broken. The person who it was purchased for is 19 and takes care of things. I was dissapointed.
customer_reviews.author: Joann Logsdon

customer_reviews.title: The necklace looks just like the picture
customer_reviews.text: The necklace looks just like the picture. The script on the name plate looks very nice. The chain is think and the length is perfect not too long but not too short.
customer_reviews.author: JENNIFER PINEYRO

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my 13yr old daughter. Came in a cute box with a bow. Good quality and the thickness of the name charm Is quite nice. Not cheap looking and flimsy. Looks really good on.
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: I love my necklace. I have gotten so many compliments on where i got my necklace. One person i told them that i bought my necklace on amazon, & they went on the website & literally bought it 5min later for a gift for their girlfriend.
customer_reviews.author: mia

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very awesome necklace. The writing isn't very large & it's not flimsy made. The chain is about 16 inches so perfect for a kid and adult might need a chain extension. The chain isn't too bad quality either. Pretty good product for the price honestly.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, would recommend
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift and the shipping was very fast and the quality is very nice. Only thing (it’s minor) I wish the box it came in was a little nicer for gifting.
customer_reviews.author: MMN425

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, lasted longer than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for the price, didn't turn skin green. Purchase for 15 year old birthday in April. Almost September now, just starting to fade. She wears everyday but takes it off to swim, wears in shower.
customer_reviews.author: MrsAshworth

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, super fast shipping, worth every penny. It is a gift and I am sure the birthday girl will flip. I always worry about buying jewelry online, but this necklace gave me nothing to worry about.
customer_reviews.author: william e. watkinson

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It’s exactly what it says in the description. I would just watch out as some of the letters may not be rounded out completely- so a little rough to the touch. But honestly I took a super light nail file and it rounded out super easy. Great purchase overall
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: ADORABLE
customer_reviews.text: Pros: I just love this necklace to pieces! Very Carrie Bradshaw :) Very good quality for the price and the packaging is adorable. Cons: it isn’t as big as I thought it was. But then again, my name is only 4 letters :)
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Gold Cynthia Name Necklace
customer_reviews.text: I bought this necklace because I always wanted a necklace with my name on it. The necklace is nice and has a good chain length. I am content with this necklace.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Acosta

customer_reviews.title: Decent...
customer_reviews.text: When I first opened the package, my first thought was that the chain was fairly thin. I thought that it wouldn't be a big deal but after owning the necklace for 2 weeks, the chain snapped. The necklace is beautiful and I wore it in the shower every day, but I just wish the chain was thicker. Might be a necklace to just wear occasionally and not every day.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna H.

customer_reviews.title: A necklace as great as I am (really great)
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and just like the picture! I like that the chain is on the shorter side because I plan on layering it with other necklaces. It also came in a cute little box with a bow on it
customer_reviews.author: Lennox

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: I give it 5 stars for not tarnishing yet. I'm surprised because my daughter never takes it off and showers with it on.
customer_reviews.author: classybdriver

customer_reviews.title: Cute well made necklace
customer_reviews.text: Daughter Loves this cute little necklace. I was very impressed with this piece. Arrived in a nice little gift box. Well worth the cost. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Had it for about 6 months now no changes in color. Thin and cute! Perfect length
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Cutie necklace
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves this necklace she will not take it off. I think I would order one if they carried my name.
customer_reviews.author: roz

customer_reviews.title: Everyone needs this staple-necklace
customer_reviews.text: This is your basic name necklace, every girl should have one as an option. Cute, well made and just the right size.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Cute but broken easily
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter and it broke the 2nd time she wore it. It’s a cute necklace but not durable at all.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Love this necklace, but this has broke 3 times. I’ve rebought it and it too broke.

customer_reviews.title: Cute gift
customer_reviews.text: Name plate seems sturdy. It's smooth on both sides, and looks really nice for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Nia Ball

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! Finish and font look great! The name itself is thick but not too thick. Looks durable! Bought as a Xmas gift—can’t wait to give it!
customer_reviews.author: Erin P.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: Got as a gift for my sister, she absolutley loved it and I havent seen her take it off to this day.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Carrero

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: So worth the price! I wanted a name necklace that was inexpensive and this was the only “Alexa” I could find that wasn’t a custom necklace. I’ve had it for a few months now and I wear it whenever I go out somewhere that’s not work and I haven’t had any problems yet. It hasn’t tarnished or faded and the chain is still sturdy as ever. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Alexa Fischer

customer_reviews.title: Purchased in 2017!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this necklace since 2017, I sometimes wear it in the shower. Has not turned or rusted. Absolutely love this necklace and I still get complaints. Delivery was fast! I say Purchase this item! ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product! I’ve been wearing it everyday for the past 3 years!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product!!! I’ve been wearing this necklace everyday for the past 3 years (literally everyday) I don’t take it off for anything and I can confidently say I’ve never had one single problem with it. It has held up great, I’ve never had to fix the chain and I love the length. I 100% would buy again!!!

customer_reviews.title: I enjoy the necklace but should be able to buy it ...
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy the necklace but should be able to buy it with a longer chain, feels more like a choker.

customer_reviews.title: Clasp not made well. My necklace slipped off my neck.
customer_reviews.text: Clasp is not made well. I was wearing thu necklace and I felt for it on my neck. I was able to locate it, however, it happened again and this time it was gone and nowhere to be found.

I'm glad I weighed the positive reviews over the negative, b'c this necklace is perfect ! She'll love it & I'll be getting one for myself shortly.

product_meta.title: Beam Reach Custom Name Necklace Personalized in Silver and Gold Tone, Choose Your Name, 18 Inches
product_meta.description:
Express yourself in this classic nameplate necklace. Necklace is made up of silver tone brass metal or gold tone brass metal, and measures 1 - 1 1/2 inches. Nameplate hangs on a 16 inch cable chain with a lobster claw clasp.




PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Item model number :BRName Parent
 * Department :Womens
 * Date First Available :February 4, 2020
 * Manufacturer :Beam Reach
 * ASIN :B084GXM78S

 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #87,671 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry)  *  #727 inWomen's Pendants 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.4 out of 5 stars623 ratings Express yourself in this classic nameplate necklace. Necklace is made up of silver tone brass metal or gold tone brass metal, and measures 1 - 1 1/2 inches. Nameplate hangs on a 16 inch cable chain with a lobster claw clasp.
feature_bullets: PERSONALIZED: 100 Names Are Available To Purchase Right Now - Available In Yellow Gold Tone and Silver Tone
FASHIONABLE: Each Name Pendant hands on a 16 inch cable chain with lobster-claw clasp
EXCELLENT GIFT: This necklace is an excellent gift for anniversaries, graduations, birthdays or just as a surprise to remind that special someone how much you care.
UNIQUE: You can wear your name, your child's name - options are endless!
